text: I had an interview yesterday for an summer undergraduate research position where by the end it just turned into me selling Julia to the interviewer. #doingmypart

elements.text: I had an interview yesterday for an summer undergraduate research position where by the end it just turned into me selling Julia to the interviewer. #doingmypart

text: Sounds familiar. I had a phone conversation today with a recruiter recruiting to a small AI firm that uses C++ and Python and Tensorflow and a host of big data platform services like Spark. I’m not likely to get that position, but in the end I was suggesting that I’d be a good person to write Julia if they’d be interested. :this_is_fine_parrot:

text: Operation sneak Julia into production code has begun. Best of luck with the position in any case.

text: New strategy: Becoming an inadvertent door-to-door Julia salesperson by getting rejected continuously from interviews
